hero_subtitle: Create a Fast, Easy, Flexible and Efficient Data Infrastructure that grows with you thanks to Renoir
hero_title: You need a Brush to paint a Data Masterpiece
about_us_subtitle: Databrush is built on decades of expertise in designing distributed infrastructures for data analytics. Led by Davide, Luca, and Fabio, and supported by Gianpaolo and Alessandro from Politecnico di Milano it combines technological innovation and strategic vision to tackle the most complex challenges.
stats_subtitle: Is just the beginning but it keeps growing
services_item_1_description: For sales teams that need to prepare for meetings with clients by having all the information they need at their fingertips.
services_item_2_description: For customer support teams that need to respond to emails quickly and efficiently.
services_item_3_description: For companies that need to monitor and analyze sensor data in real-time.
features_subtitle: Renoir has several features that make it a great choice for your company data infrastructure
features_item_1_description: Built with Rust, ensuring high performance and reliability. Renoir is designed to perform even in the most critical tasks.
features_item_2_description: Design to handle real-time data streams, Renoir is the perfect choice for companies that need to process data when they are generated.
features_item_3_description: Easily customizable to perform even the most complex tasks for every vertical scenario, making it the ultimate solution for your needs.
features_item_4_description: Optimized for speed and performance to ensure insights are delivered quickly and efficiently.
features_item_5_description: Designed with user-friendliness in mind, thanks to its high-level API, Renoir is easy to use and integrate with your existing infrastructure.
features_item_6_description: The engine of Renoir is open source, allowing the community to contribute and improve the platform.
use_cases_item_1_description: Analyze your data without sharing them with anyone. Keep your insights inside the 4 walls of your company, optimize your decisions and forecast your trends, all while maintaining complete data sovereignty.
use_cases_item_2_description: Reduce downtime and maximize efficiency with continuous machine monitoring and real-time data analysis, ensuring smooth and efficient operations.
use_cases_item_3_description: Leverage Renoir and local AI models to uncover new opportunities and optimize business strategies, even with limited existing infrastructure.
faq_item_1_title: How do I start using Renoir?
faq_item_1_description: You can start usign Renoir following the quick start guide in the documentation. It is easier than you think. If you need help, you can reach out to our support team.
faq_item_2_description: Renoir is a powerful and flexible platform it is designed to scale with your company and adapt to your needs. This means that you can focus on what really matters: your business. It cuts down the time to market, operetional cost and allows you to make data-driven decisions.
faq_item_3_title: Where can I find more information about Renoir?
faq_item_3_description: If you need more information about Renoir, you can visit our documentation page. There you will find all the information you need to start using Renoir. More technical information can be found in the GitHub repository. Lastly if you want to read use cases or research papers, you can visit our blog.
faq_item_4_title: Can I try Renoir before buying?
faq_item_4_description: Yes, the engine of Renoir is and always will be open source. You can try it and use it for free. Be part of our community and help us to improve the platform. If you need more from Renoir, you can always upgrade to the enterprise version.
faq_item_5_title: How can Databrush help my company?
faq_item_5_description: Databrish is a team of experts in data analytics and distributed infrastructures. We can help you to design and implement the best data infrastructure for your company. We can help you to extract value from your data and make data-driven decisions. We can help you to scale your data infrastructure and analytics. If you want to know more about how we can help you, you can contact us.
faq_item_6_description: Renoir is born after years of experience in designing distributed infrastructures for data analytics. We saw that there was a need for a real-time streaming framework that was easy to use, scalable and reliable; withouth reducing the performance. Renoir is the answer to that need. It is designed to be the ultimate solution for your data infrastructure.
contact_subtitle: Whether you have a question about features, trials, pricing, need a demo, or anything else, our team is ready to answer all your questions.
contact_textarea_placeholder: HI, I would like to know more about Renoir and how it can help my company.
contact_disclaimer_label: By submitting this contact form, you acknowledge and agree to the collection of your personal information.
contact_description: Our support team typically responds within 24 business hours.
cta_title: Be a part of our vision
cta_subtitle: Join the Renoir community and start building your data infrastructure today.
roadmap_subtitle: Our vision is to create something that is easy to use, powerful, and flexible. We are working hard to make Renoir the best tool for managing and analysing your data.
roadmap_phase_1_description:
• Evaluation with real-world use cases
  • Geo-distributed deployments
  • Domain-specific programming abstractions
roadmap_phase_2_description:
• New platform to create and manage Renoir's workflows
  • AI-driven tools to streamline pipeline creation
  • API support for easy external tool integration
roadmap_phase_3_description:
• Renoir Cloud where pipelines run on our infrastructure
  • Host webinars and workshops for faster onboarding
  • Overall improvements to the platform based on user feedback
contact_hero_subtitle: In Databrush we are always open to new partnerships, collaborations, and opportunities. We are here to help you with any questions you may have.
contact_form_subtitle: For quicker answers, explore our FAQs section. You may find the solution you're looking for right there! If not, the Databrush team is delighted to help you. Use the form below or write to us at info@databrush.it
contact_support_item_1_description: Chat with us for general questions, feedback, suggestions, or any other inquiries not covered by the other support categories.
contact_support_item_2_description: Chat with us for sales inquiries, custom projects, partnerships, or other business-related matters.
contact_support_item_3_description: Chat with us for technical issues, bugs, feature requests, or any other technical inquiries.
about_hero_title:
Decades of experience in
Data Infrastructures
about_hero_subtitle: Databrush is built on decades of expertise in designing distributed infrastructures for data analytics. Led by Davide, Luca, and Fabio, and supported by Gianpaolo and Alessandro from Politecnico di Milano it combines technological innovation and strategic vision to tackle the most complex challenges.
about_strengths_subtitle: We are a team of experts in data infrastructures, data analytics, and distributed systems. Born from the Politecnico di Milano, our team is based on years of intense research and development in the field of data analytics. Always up to date with the latest technologies, we are ready to face any challenge.
about_strength_1_description: We design and implement distributed infrastructures for data analytics. Thanks to our expertise, we can provide the best solutions for your business whether you are a small company or a large corporation.
about_strength_2_description: We know how to extract value from your data. Our team of experts will help you to understand your data and to make the best decisions for your business.
about_strength_3_description: We know how to make your data fly. Our solutions are designed to be fast and efficient, so you can get the most out of your data in the shortest time possible.
about_values_subtitle: We are committed to providing the best solutions for your business. Our values are the foundation of our success and the key to our future growth.
about_value_1_description: We based our business on the needs of our customers. We are always looking for new ways to improve our services and to provide the best solutions for your business.
about_value_2_description: We are and always be researcher at heart. We are always looking for new technologies and new ways to improve our services.
about_value_3_description: We believe in the power of open source. We are always looking for new ways to contribute to the community and to share our knowledge with others.
error_404_message: Sorry, we couldn't find this page.
error_404_description: But dont worry, you can find plenty of other things on our homepage.
renoir_hero_title: Renoir is a distributed data processing platform
renoir_hero_subtitle: Based on the dataflow paradigm Renoir provides an ergonomic programming interface, similar to that of Apache Flink, but has much better performance characteristics
renoir_features_subtitle: Discover the key features that make Renoir the ideal choice for your data processing needs.
renoir_features_item_1_description: Built with Rust, ensuring high performance and reliability. Renoir is designed to perform even in the most critical tasks.
renoir_features_item_2_description: Design to handle real-time data streams, Renoir is the perfect choice for companies that need to process data when they are generated.
renoir_features_item_3_description: Easily customizable to perform even the most complex tasks for every vertical scenario, making it the ultimate solution for your needs.
renoir_features_item_4_description: Optimized for speed and performance to ensure insights are delivered quickly and efficiently.
renoir_features_item_5_description: Designed with user-friendliness in mind, thanks to its high-level API, Renoir is easy to use and integrate with your existing infrastructure.
renoir_features_item_6_description: The engine of Renoir is open source, allowing the community to contribute and improve the platform.
renoir_use_cases_subtitle: Discover how Renoir can be used in different scenarios to solve complex problems.
renoir_use_case_1_description: Analyze your data without sharing them with anyone. Keep your insights inside the 4 walls of your company, optimize your decisions and forecast your trends, all while maintaining complete data sovereignty. Renoir offers the tools and capabilities to help you achieve your goals without the high cost of traditional infrastructure.
renoir_use_case_1_examples:
Healthcare providers analyzing sensitive patient data locally to improve care while maintaining HIPAA compliance and full privacy protection.
Financial institutions processing confidential transaction data on-premises to meet regulatory requirements and protect customer privacy.
Government agencies analyzing classified or sensitive citizen data within secure internal infrastructure without external cloud dependencies.
renoir_use_case_2_description: Renoir is the ideal solution for Industry 4.0 companies looking to optimize their monitoring processes. Reduce downtime and maximize efficiency with continuous machine monitoring and real-time data analysis, ensuring smooth and efficient operations. With Renoir, Industry 4.0 companies can achieve new levels of efficiency and productivity.
renoir_use_case_2_examples:
Production plants that continuously monitor machinery to optimize production and reduce downtime.
Energy sectors that analyze consumption and production data in real-time to balance loads and reduce waste.
renoir_use_case_3_description: Leverage Renoir and local AI models to uncover new opportunities and optimize business strategies, even with limited existing infrastructure. With Renoir, you can transform your data into actionable insights and drive your business forward.
renoir_use_case_3_examples:
Small and medium-sized enterprises collecting data from CRM and social media but not utilizing it to identify market opportunities or optimize campaigns.
Public entities with archives of historical data not leveraged for predictive analysis or public service improvements.
renoir_pricing_open_source_subtitle: The Renoir Engine is and always will be open source
renoir_pricing_enterprise_subtitle: Premium features for large-scale projects, tailored support

We saw that there was a need for a real-time streaming framework that was easy to use, scalable and reliable; withouth reducing the performance. Renoir is the answer to that need. It is designed to be the ultimate solution for your data infrastructure.
renoir_contact_subtitle: Have questions? Feel free to contact us using the form below. We're here to help!
renoir_blog_description: Read the latest articles and stay up to date with the latest trends in data analytics and distributed systems.
blog_slogan: Insights, case studies, and tutorials on data integration and AI.
agent_hero_subtitle: Empower your business with Renoir across email, sales, and intelligence. The Agent² package transforms how you interact with customers and analyze data.
agent_overview_item_1_description: Designed to revolutionize business operations: Mail, Sales, and Intelligence
agent_overview_item_2_description: Thanks to Renoir, make data-driven decisions with advanced analytics.
agent_overview_item_3_title: Without leaving the walls of your business
agent_overview_item_3_description: Everything will be managed internally, ensuring data privacy and security.
agent_mail_description: Transform your email management with local AI agents that know your business and give you the answers that you need, when you need them.
agent_mail_item_1_description: Automatically categorize, prioritize, and route incoming emails based on content and context
agent_mail_item_2_description: Search in your company data the needed information
agent_mail_item_3_description: Generate a report that gives you all the information you need to answer
agent_sales_description: Make sure your salespeople never run out of the ideas they need.
agent_sales_item_1_description: Based on your questions, the system will undestand the client and the context
agent_sales_item_2_description: Quickly access relevant documents and information in your business data
agent_sales_item_3_description: Generate a comprehensive report with key insights and talking points before client meetings
agent_intelligence_description: Keep your company under control, monitor and manage every sector so you don't have surprises
agent_intelligence_item_1_description: Process and analyze large volumes of data to uncover hidden patterns and trends
agent_intelligence_item_2_description: Use machine learning to forecast business outcomes and identify risks
agent_intelligence_item_3_description: Monitor key metrics and receive instant alerts on critical business events
agent_benefits_subtitle: Experience the benefits of integrated intelligent automation
agent_benefits_item_1_description: Automate routine tasks and free up your team to focus on high-value activities
agent_benefits_item_2_description: Respond faster and more accurately to customer needs
agent_benefits_item_3_description: Make informed choices based on comprehensive analytics and predictive modeling
agent_benefits_item_4_description: Grow your automation capabilities as your business expands
agent_benefits_item_5_description: You don't have to pay for expensive cloud services, run it all internally
agent_benefits_item_6_description: Stay ahead with cutting-edge technology and insights
agent_faq_item_1_description: Agent² is an intelligent business automation package that combines three powerful modules - Mail, Sales, and Intelligence - to streamline operations, enhance customer engagement, and provide actionable insights.
agent_faq_item_2_title: How does Agent² integrate with existing systems?
agent_faq_item_2_description: Renoir is designed with flexibility in mind and can integrate with most popular CRM systems, email platforms, and business tools through APIs and standard connectors. Our team can help with custom integrations for your specific needs.
agent_faq_item_3_title: Is my data secure with Agent²?
agent_faq_item_3_description: Yes, everythiong is run locally within your business infrastructure, ensuring maximum data privacy and security. No more cloud services.
agent_faq_item_4_title: Can I use individual modules or do I need all three?
agent_faq_item_4_description: While the modules work best together, you can start with individual modules based on your immediate needs and expand to the full platform as your requirements grow.
agent_faq_item_5_title: What kind of support is available?
agent_faq_item_5_description: We offer comprehensive support including onboarding assistance, training resources and technical documentation.
agent_faq_item_6_description: Implementation time varies based on your specific requirements and existing infrastructure. A basic setup can be completed in a few weeks, while more complex, customized deployments may take 2-3 months.
agent_cta_subtitle:
Discover how Agent² can revolutionize your operations with intelligent automation.
Contact us today for a personalized demonstration.
landing_agent_subtitle: Transform your business operations with AI-powered automation across email, sales, and intelligence.
landing_agent_description: The Agent² package combines three powerful modules to revolutionize how you interact with customers and analyze data. Built on Renoir's robust infrastructure, it brings intelligent automation directly into your business without relying on cloud services.
landing_agent_item_1_description: AI-powered email management that understands your business context
landing_agent_item_2_description: Empower your sales team with instant insights and comprehensive reports
landing_agent_item_3_description: Real-time analytics and predictive modeling for data-driven decisions
email_hero_subtitle: Aave time by auto-retrieving informations and generating brilliant responses.
email_features_subtitle: Capabilities that help you respond faster and with more context
email_feature_1_description: Automatically finds relevant documents, attachments, and previous correspondence to include context in replies.
email_feature_2_description: Summarizes long email threads and documents into concise talking points and action items.
email_feature_3_description: Generates multiple reply options (formal, friendly, short) you can edit and send.
email_feature_4_description: Connects with Outlook and Gmail for one-click insertion and sending of drafted replies.
email_use_cases_subtitle: Where the Sales Agent helps the most
email_use_case_1_description: Reduce response time by surfacing relevant KB articles and suggested replies tailored to the customer issue.
email_use_case_2_description: Automatically pulls contract clauses and prior negotiations to draft compliant, informed replies.
email_use_case_3_description: Helps HR teams respond to policy questions, onboarding queries, and internal requests consistently.
email_cta_subtitle: Request a demo and let the assistant draft your next reply.
sales_hero_subtitle: Combines documents, news, and conversations and makes them available with one click before the meeting with the client.
sales_features_subtitle: Everything you need to know about your client before the meeting starts
sales_feature_1_description: Automatically compiles comprehensive client profiles from multiple sources including past interactions, company data, and market intelligence.
sales_feature_2_description: Creates concise briefings with key talking points, potential objections, and tailored opportunities for each meeting.
sales_feature_3_description: Connects with your CRM to pull historical data.
sales_feature_4_description: Monitors news, social media, and industry reports to provide the latest trends.
sales_use_cases_subtitle: Where the Sales Agent makes the biggest impact
sales_use_case_1_description: Equip large sales teams with consistent, up-to-date client intelligence to improve conversion rates and deal sizes.
sales_use_case_2_description: Help account managers stay on top of client developments and identify upselling or cross-selling opportunities.
sales_use_case_3_description: Prepare consultants with deep client insights to deliver more relevant solutions and build stronger relationships.
sales_cta_title: Get ready for your best meeting yet
sales_cta_subtitle: Request a demo and see how the Sales Agent can transform your client meetings.
dashboard_hero_subtitle: From sensor's data streams to Real-Time Insights
dashboard_features_subtitle: How Renoir transforms sensor data into actionable visual dashboards
dashboard_feature_1_description: Monitor live sensor streams with instant data visualization that updates automatically as new measurements arrive.
dashboard_feature_2_description: Intelligent algorithms identify unusual patterns and outliers in sensor data before they become critical issues.
dashboard_feature_3_description: Set up personalized notification triggers based on specific thresholds, patterns, or business logic requirements.
dashboard_feature_4_description: Deploy processing capabilities both in the cloud and at the edge for optimal performance and reduced latency.
dashboard_use_cases_subtitle: Where sensor analytics delivers the most value
dashboard_use_case_1_description: Monitor production lines, equipment health, and environmental conditions to optimize manufacturing processes and prevent downtime.
dashboard_use_case_2_description: Track power consumption, grid performance, and renewable energy generation to optimize efficiency and reduce costs.
dashboard_use_case_3_description: Monitor transportation systems, building environments, and supply chain operations for improved efficiency and safety.
dashboard_cta_title: Transform your sensor data into insights
dashboard_cta_subtitle: Discover how Renoir can turn your raw sensor streams into powerful real-time dashboards and alerts.
